00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board.h"
00031 #include "ht32_board_config.h"
00032 
00033 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00034   * @{
00035   */
00036 
00037 /** @addtogroup I2C_Examples I2C

00039   */

00041 /** @addtogroup I2C_10_bit_mode
00042   * @{
00043   */
00044 
00045 
00046 /* Private types -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 typedef enum {Fail = 0, Pass = !Fail} TestResult;
00048 
00049 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00050 #define I2C_MASTER_ADDRESS     0x10A
00051 #define I2C_SLAVE_ADDRESS      0x360
00052 #define BufferSize             4
00053 #define ClockSpeed             1000000
00054 
00055 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00056 void I2C_Configuration(void);
00057 void I2C_Loopback(void);
00058 TestResult CmpBuffer(u8* Buffer1, u8* Buffer2, u32 BufferLength);
00059 
00060 /* Private variables ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00061 I2C_InitTypeDef  I2C_InitStructure;
00062 
00063 u8 I2C_Master_Buffer_Tx[BufferSize] = {0x1, 0x2, 0x3, 0x4};
00064 vu8 Tx_Index = 0;
00065 
00066 u8 I2C_Slave_Buffer_Rx[BufferSize] = {0};
00067 vu8 Rx_Index = 0;
00068 
00069 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00070 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00071   * @brief  Main program.
00072   * @retval None
00073   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00074 int main(void)
00075 {
00076   /* Initialize LED1 & LED2 on HT32 board                                                                   */
00077   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED1);
00078   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED2);
00079 
00080   I2C_Configuration();                /* I2C configuration                                                  */
00081 
00082   /* Check the status of the I2C master-slave step and send data from the master to the slave.              */
00083   I2C_Loopback();
00084 
00085   while (1);
00086 }
00087 
00088 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00089   * @brief  Configure the I2C.
00090   * @retval None
00091   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00092 void I2C_Configuration(void)
00093 {
00094   /* Enable I2C0 ,I2C1 & AFIO APB clock                                                                     */
00095   CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{0}};
00096   CKCUClock.Bit.I2C0       = 1;
00097   CKCUClock.Bit.I2C1       = 1;
00098   CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO       = 1;
00099   CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00100 
00101   /* Configure GPIO to I2C mode for Master                                                                  */
00102   AFIO_GPxConfig(I2C_MASTER_SCL_GPIO_ID, I2C_MASTER_SCL_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_I2C);
00103   AFIO_GPxConfig(I2C_MASTER_SDA_GPIO_ID, I2C_MASTER_SDA_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_I2C);
00104 
00105   /* Configure GPIO to I2C mode for Slave                                                                   */
00106   AFIO_GPxConfig(I2C_SLAVE_SCL_GPIO_ID, I2C_SLAVE_SCL_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_I2C);
00107   AFIO_GPxConfig(I2C_SLAVE_SDA_GPIO_ID, I2C_SLAVE_SDA_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_I2C);
00108 
00109   /* I2C Master configuration                                                                               */
00110   I2C_InitStructure.I2C_GeneralCall = DISABLE;
00111   I2C_InitStructure.I2C_AddressingMode = I2C_ADDRESSING_10BIT;
00112   I2C_InitStructure.I2C_Acknowledge = DISABLE;
00113   I2C_InitStructure.I2C_OwnAddress = I2C_MASTER_ADDRESS;
00114   I2C_InitStructure.I2C_Speed = ClockSpeed;
00115   I2C_InitStructure.I2C_SpeedOffset = 0;
00116   I2C_Init(I2C_MASTER_PORT, &I2C_InitStructure);
00117 
00118   /* I2C Slave configuration                                                                                */
00119   I2C_InitStructure.I2C_GeneralCall = DISABLE;
00120   I2C_InitStructure.I2C_AddressingMode = I2C_ADDRESSING_10BIT;
00121   I2C_InitStructure.I2C_Acknowledge = ENABLE;
00122   I2C_InitStructure.I2C_OwnAddress = I2C_SLAVE_ADDRESS;
00123   I2C_Init(I2C_SLAVE_PORT, &I2C_InitStructure);
00124 
00125   /* Enable I2C0 & I2C1                                                                                     */
00126   I2C_Cmd(I2C_MASTER_PORT, ENABLE);
00127   I2C_Cmd(I2C_SLAVE_PORT, ENABLE);
00128 }
00129 
00130 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00131   * @brief  Check the status of the I2C master-slave step and send data from the master to the slave.
00132   * @retval None
00133   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00134 void I2C_Loopback(void)
00135 {
00136   /* Send I2C START & I2C slave address for write                                                           */
00137   I2C_TargetAddressConfig(I2C_MASTER_PORT, I2C_SLAVE_ADDRESS, I2C_MASTER_WRITE);
00138 
00139   /* Check on Master Transmitter STA condition and clear it                                                 */
00140   while (!I2C_CheckStatus(I2C_MASTER_PORT, I2C_MASTER_SEND_START));
00141 
00142   /* Check on Slave Receiver ADRS condition and clear it                                                    */
00143   while (!I2C_CheckStatus(I2C_SLAVE_PORT, I2C_SLAVE_ACK_RECEIVER_ADDRESS));
00144 
00145   /* Check on Master Transmitter ADRS condition and clear it                                                */
00146   while (!I2C_CheckStatus(I2C_MASTER_PORT, I2C_MASTER_TRANSMITTER_MODE));
00147 
00148   /* Send data                                                                                              */
00149   while (Rx_Index < BufferSize)
00150   {
00151     /* Check on Master Transmitter TXDE condition                                                           */
00152     while (!I2C_CheckStatus(I2C_MASTER_PORT, I2C_MASTER_TX_EMPTY));
00153     /* Master Send I2C data                                                                                 */
00154     I2C_SendData(I2C_MASTER_PORT, I2C_Master_Buffer_Tx[Tx_Index ++]);
00155 
00156     /* Check on Slave Receiver RXDNE condition                                                              */
00157     while (!I2C_CheckStatus(I2C_SLAVE_PORT, I2C_SLAVE_RX_NOT_EMPTY));
00158     /* Store received data on I2C1                                                                          */
00159     I2C_Slave_Buffer_Rx[Rx_Index ++] = I2C_ReceiveData(I2C_SLAVE_PORT);
00160   }
00161 
00162   /* Send I2C STOP condition                                                                                */
00163   I2C_GenerateSTOP(I2C_MASTER_PORT);
00164 
00165   /* Check on Slave Receiver STO condition                                                                  */
00166   while (!I2C_CheckStatus(I2C_SLAVE_PORT, I2C_SLAVE_STOP_DETECTED));
00167 
00168   /* Check on validity of received data on I2C Slave                                                        */
00169   if (CmpBuffer(I2C_Master_Buffer_Tx, I2C_Slave_Buffer_Rx, BufferSize))
00170   {
00171     HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED1);
00172   }
00173   else
00174   {
00175     HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED2);
00176   }
00177 }
00178 
00179 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00180   * @brief  Compare two buffers.
00181   * @param  Buffer1, Buffer2: buffers to be compared.
00182   * @param  BufferLength: buffer's length
00183   * @retval None
00184   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00185 TestResult CmpBuffer(u8* Buffer1, u8* Buffer2, u32 BufferLength)
00186 {
00187   while (BufferLength--)
00188   {
00189     if (*Buffer1 != *Buffer2)
00190     {
00191       return Fail;
00192     }
00193 
00194     Buffer1++;
00195     Buffer2++;
00196   }
00197 
00198   return Pass;
00199 }

00201 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)

00203   * @brief  Report both the error name of the source file and the source line number.
00204   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00205   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00206   * @retval None
00207   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00208 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00209 {
00210   /*
00211      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00212      Debug message can be added here.
00213      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00214   */
00215 
00216   while (1)
00217   {
00218   }
00219 }
00220 #endif
